summary: The class integrates a LayoutLMv3 image processor and a tokenizer to provide a unified preprocessing pipeline for document images. It handles image resizing, normalization, optional OCR extraction of words and bounding boxes, and converts these into token-level inputs (ids, masks, token types, and bounding boxes) suitable for the LayoutLMv3 model, with optional label mapping for token classification.
business_intent: Enable developers to efficiently prepare document image data for LayoutLMv3, streamlining the workflow for tasks such as form understanding, receipt parsing, and other token classification applications in document AI.
